meanings.sent1: I will predefine the rules before we start the game.
meanings.sent2: It is important to predefine the objectives of the project.
meanings.sent3: Let's predefine the menu for the party to avoid any confusion.
meanings.sent4: She predefines her daily schedule to stay organized.
meanings.sent5: The teacher predefines the lesson plan to ensure smooth learning.

meanings.definition: To set or establish in advance
meanings.sent1: The company will predefine the budget for the upcoming year.
meanings.sent2: You should predefine your goals before starting a new venture.
meanings.sent3: He likes to predefine his travel itinerary to save time.
meanings.sent4: The team predefines the roles and responsibilities for each member.
meanings.sent5: It is wise to predefine the terms of the agreement to avoid misunderstandings.
